TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Makazayazaya, title = Makazayazaya, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Makazayazaya} }

S.FORM: Makazayazaya Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtung ko Makazayazaya a niyaro', 86 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 261 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 256 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan92 , Rukai1 , Tayal1 , roma3 .
